price: 49 Tu verras, ce Jour-là, les criminels enchaînés les uns aux autres,
arabic: وَتَرَى ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ يَوۡمَئِذٖ مُّقَرَّنِينَ فِي ٱلۡأَصۡفَادِ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: watarā al-muj'rimīna yawma-idhin muqarranīna fī al-aṣfādi
